jp_text: お餅なん

en_text: Wait, is it okay to light a \Nfire inside a snow house?
jp_text: あれ　かまくらの中で火焚いても大丈夫なの
google_translated: It is okay if you finish in that

en_text: Maybe we should use the \Nbrazier outside...
jp_text: じゃ　七輪はかまくらの外で
google_translated: The seven wheels are outside the makugura

en_text: Mochi! Mochi!
jp_text: 蛍　早すぎ

en_text: Mochi mochi mochi!
jp_text: 餅餅餅

en_text: Uh, well, you're as aggressive \Nas usual, Hotarun.
jp_text: あ　いや　さすがアグレッシブほたるん

en_text: It's bigger inside than I expected.
jp_text: 思ってたより中広いですよ
google_translated: It is a sloppy than I thought

en_text: It was worth making it the right way.
jp_text: ちゃんと作った甲斐あったな

en_text: I'm turning the mochi!
jp_text: あ　もうこげめついてる

en_text: What?! It's already done?!
jp_text: 豚汁ならもうとっくにできてる
google_translated: If it is pork juice, it is already done

en_text: Here you go. Pork miso soup.
jp_text: 豚汁　豚汁　豚汁　豚汁
google_translated: Pork soup pork soup pork soup

en_text: There's plenty more where this came from.
jp_text: やった　絶対おかわりしよう

en_text: Okay!
jp_text: はいよ

en_text: All right! I'm gonna get seconds!
jp_text: いただきます

en_text: I'm gonna put mochi in my soup!
jp_text: お餅豚汁に入れるん
google_translated: I put in a pork soup

en_text: Me, too!
jp_text: うちも

en_text: Here, Hotaru.
jp_text: はい　蛍

en_text: It's delicious!
jp_text: 美味しい

en_text: Seconds!
jp_text: おかわり

en_text: Spring Came Again
jp_text: きれい
